light_cleaned_title: Oneplus U series 55 or Blaupunkt 65 QLED
light_cleaned_selftext: Hello all, i planning to buy a TV budget with a budget of around 50-53 ish. so far have come across many brands. hardstuck on LED vs. QLED. The viewing distance is 7-10 feet. I'll share both TV which I have in my wishlist RN. mostly to stream movies 4k so also considering good audio quality. all other suggestions are welcomed! [blaupunkt](https://www.flipkart.com/blaupunkt-164-cm-65-inch-qled-ultra-hd-4k-smart-google-tv-dolby-atmos-far-field-mic/p/itm72540ae31edd4?pid=TVSGHADT29D8SZKT&lid=LSTTVSGHADT29D8SZKTVDKFKC&marketplace=FLIPKART&q=qled+tv+65&store=ckf%2Fczl&srno=s_1_10&otracker=search&otracker1=search&fm=search-autosuggest&iid=d715b058-85d7-4634-9061-8a522e11beac.TVSGHADT29D8SZKT.SEARCH&ppt=sp&ppn=sp&ssid=bs39u6aam80000001693895504042&qH=b955b93293060a90) [oneplus](https://www.oneplus.in/tv-55u1) ​ ​
